name: G30
summary: Unique puzzles that are deeply connected to the story â€” wrapped in stylish flat design. The game shows how a person with a mental disease conceives reality. We see the world that slips away from the main character whose personality and memory will soon fade away together with the reason of his existence.

name: G-3 Cobra of Sky
summary: A full graphic hack for the ROM Raid on Bungeling Bay which changes all the graphics in the game. Instead of flying a helicopter you know pilot a harrier jet. Also all the landscapes have been redone to give it a more urban futuristic look.
